    <section id="hero">
		<ul class="captions">
            <li class="heroSlideLiWeHaveaDifferentView"><div class="caption"><h1>We Have a Different View</h1><p>At Drexel, you'll find a world of possibility at your fingertips. Our classrooms, co-op program, student organizations, and even the city we live in, all present unique opportunities for new thinking for our students. Drexel is different. Are you?</p></div><p class="more"><a href="/difference/stories/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWeAreExperienced"><div class="caption"><h1>We Are Experienced</h1><p>Cooperative education is the centerpiece of our approach, preparing you to apply your knowledge in the real world and building your r&eacute;sum&eacute; as you learn. With over 1,700 employers, our co-op program provides avenues of success for every interest.</p></div><p class="more"><a href="/difference/co-op/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWeWelcomeAdventure"><div class="caption"><h1>We Welcome Adventure</h1><p>Located in the heart of Philadelphia, our classrooms extend into the vibrant city around us. Our horizons are not borders — they are invitations to new experiences. What will you find?</p></div><p class="more"><a href="/difference/city-living/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWeEnvisionTomorrow"><div class="caption"><h1>We Envision Tomorrow</h1><p>At Drexel, breakthroughs are made on a daily basis. Our emphasis on faculty and student research keeps us on the forefront of technology and discovery, engineering the way for the innovations of the future.</p></div><p class="more"><a href="/academics/schools/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWePushForward"><div class="caption"><h1>We Push Forward</h1><p>From academics to athletics, Drexel Dragons never shy away from a challenge. By pushing boundaries and challenging expectations, we make an impact in everything that we do — no matter the venue.</p>
</div><p class="more"><a href="/campus-life/overview/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWeOpenDoors"><div class="caption"><h1>We Open Doors</h1><p>Through groundbreaking research and development, Drexel faculty and students continue to test the limits of what's possible. What will you discover?</p>
</div><p class="more"><a href="/research-enterprise/overview/">Learn More</a></p></li><li class="heroSlideLiWeAreaCommunity"><div class="caption"><h1>We Are a Community</h1><p>Through dedicated civic engagement and public service initiatives, we work together with our neighbors to build a brighter future for the City of Philadelphia. How will you help?</p></div><p class="more"><a href="/campus-life/community/">Learn More</a></p></li>
        </ul>
    </section>
</div>
